Venom drench.effect: Venom Drench can only target a Poisoned or Toxified enemy. On hit, the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are -3 for 10 mins

Venoshock.name: Venoshock
Venoshock.effect: If the target is Poisoned or Toxified, Venoshock has 4d10 for damage instead

Victory dance.name: Victory dance
Victory dance.effect: Your Attack, Special Attack, Defense, and Special Defense are all +2 for 5 mins

Vital throw.name: Vital throw
Vital throw.effect: You can’t miss targets with less than 15 Defense if the target already acted this round. On hit, move the target away from you 15ft

Volt tackle.name: Volt tackle
Volt tackle.effect: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/3rd of the damage you deal and if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Paralyzed

Wake-up slap.name: Wake-up slap
Wake-up slap.effect: If Wake-Up Slap is used against a Sleeping target, Wake-Up Slap deals 5d8 for damage instead, then cures the target of Sleep. If you choose not to roll damage while using Wake-Up Slap, you do not need to roll an Accuracy Check

Water pulse.name: Water pulse
Water pulse.effect: On hit, if you got 16 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Confused

Water shuriken.name: Water shuriken
Water shuriken.effect: Water Shuriken has Priority and is a Scatter attack. Up to 5 attacks

Water sport.name: Water sport
Water sport.effect: Put a Water Coat on the target or yourself. The Coat has the following ability: Reduce damage from Fire attacks that hit you by 10. This Coat lasts for 2 mins

Water spout.name: Water spout
Water spout.effect: If you are at Max HP, Water Spout has 5d12 for damage instead

Waterfall.name: Waterfall
Waterfall.effect: On hit, if you got 16 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned

Wave crash.name: Wave crash
Wave crash.effect: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/4th of the damage you deal. Your Speed is +2 for 10 mins

Weather ball.name: Weather ball
Weather ball.effect: If within weather, Weather Ball has 5d8 for damage instead and its type changes to match the weather

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.effect: On hit, the target is bound in place for 1d4 rounds. For each round the target is bound, it takes 1d4 damage on its turns

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.effect: On hit, moves the target 60ft away

Wild charge.name: Wild charge
Wild charge.effect: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/4th of the damage you deal

Will-o-wisp.name: Will-o-wisp
Will-o-wisp.effect: On hit, the target is Burned

Wish.name: Wish
Wish.effect: Target an ally or yourself. After the target acts during the next round, they are healed HP equal to half of the target ’s Max HP

Wonder room.name: Wonder room
Wonder room.effect: You create a circle of Wonderful Terrain with a 60ft diameter. Anyone who attacks within the Wonderful terrain makes Attack Accuracy Checks against Special Defense and Special Attack Accuracy Checks against Defense. This terrain disappears after 2 mins

Wood hammer.name: Wood hammer
Wood hammer.effect: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/3rd of the damage you deal

Wrap.name: Wrap
Wrap.effect: On hit, the target is bound to you for 1d4 rounds. For each round the target is bound, it takes 1d4 damage on its turns

Yawn.name: Yawn
Yawn.effect: On hit, the target falls Asleep after its next turn

Zap cannon.name: Zap cannon
Zap cannon.effect: Zap Cannon has –5 during Accuracy Check. On hit the target is Paralyzed

Zen headbutt.name: Zen headbutt
Zen headbutt.effect: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned

Zing zap.name: Zing zap
Zing zap.effect: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned

Unbreakable armor.name: Unbreakable armor
Unbreakable armor.effect: Your Defense is +4 for 10 mins, your Attack and Special Attack is -10 for 10 mins

Migraine.name: Migraine
Migraine.effect: You lose HP equal to half of your Max HP, then your Special Attack is +6 for 10 mins

Unbreakable barrier.name: Unbreakable barrier
Unbreakable barrier.effect: Your Special Defense is +4 for 10 mins, your Attack and Special Attack is -10 for 10 mins

Mach speeds.name: Mach speeds
Mach speeds.effect: Your Speed is +8 for 10 mins, your Defense and Special Defense is -3 for 10 mins

Sync move.name: Sync move
Sync move.effect: You can’t miss targets with less than 15 Defense or Special Defense

Type smasher.name: Type smasher
Type smasher.effect: On hit, your Attack is +1 for 10 mins

Type flash.name: Type flash
Type flash.effect: On hit, your Special Attack is +1 for 10 mins
